articles.title: Cruise Ship Passengers in New Jersey Screened for Coronavirus
articles.description: New Jersey Governor Phil Murphy said CDC officials boarded a Royal Caribbean cruise ship docked in Bayonne this morning and screened 27 passengers who recently traveled from China. Four passengers were sent to a hospital for evaluation. (Source: Bloomberg)
